raw_comment:
There is only four countries where 40+ people think that generations get better every generation.
I wonder what effects this chart
It shows that different countries think differently probably from cultural reasons.

ace_sentences: In each of these countries, more than 40 people think that each generation gets better than the previous generation.
I wonder what effects this chart has.
The chart shows that people in different countries think differently.
Cultural reasons probably cause these differences.
Younger people seem to think more positively about the future.
